channel.title: Rouge Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rouge Village" - please join

item.title: Re: Rouge Village
item.content:encoded: please delete this thread because the village is no more

item.title: Rouge Village
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone
My village is in need of some good people to join it has alot of upgrades but they have been canceled due to to many people leaving the village and I was wondering if any of you would like to join the village just leave a comment on here and apply with in the game
